name: Goshzilla Is In Love
description:
You are Goshzilla, a giant lizard monster. You are on a date with Moffy, a giant moth monster. Good luck! 

a very short & chaotic dating simulator about dating as a giant monster.

-----------

FEATURING

⠀⠀⠀⠀🦖 3 distinct endings depending on your dialogue choices!

⠀⠀⠀⠀🦖 Buildings that topple over from you being so dang big!

⠀⠀⠀⠀🦖 Screams of the innocent!

⠀⠀⠀⠀🦖 A cute wholesome aesthetic!

⠀⠀⠀⠀🦖 An "intentional" unconventional spelling of a frozen dessert!

-----------

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys to move. 

Rotate the camera with Q/E.

Tab to open your checklist in case you get lost. 

Choose dialogue options with the arrow keys/space bar. 

Also has xbox controller support on windows. Though it is less tested.

-----------

FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE, DOWNLOAD AND PLAY ON YOUR COMPUTER

Art/music/code by Jet Simon

Some sfx from freesound

Goshzilla walk cycle animated with mixamo

Made for Brackeys Jam 2021.2
